sentences.en: a black and white photograph
sentences.cn: 黑白照片

sentences.en: a colour photograph
sentences.cn: 彩色照片

sentences.en: An outsized photograph hung above her bedroom fireplace.
sentences.cn: 一幅巨大的照片挂在她卧室的壁炉上方。

sentences.en: ate agreed to let me photograph her.
sentences.cn: 凯特同意让我为她拍照。

sentences.en: Betty took a photograph of us.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂给我们照了张相。

sentences.en: Did you see Leo’s photograph (= a photograph of Leo ) in the newspaper?
sentences.cn: 你看到报纸上利奥的照片了吗？

sentences.en: He stood by the tree to be photographed.
sentences.cn: 他站在树旁准备让人拍照。

sentences.en: He tore down the girl's photograph, and crumpled it into a ball.
sentences.cn: 他一把扯下那女孩的照片，将它揉成一团。

sentences.en: Hughes stared up at him in close-up from the photograph.
sentences.cn: 休斯抬起头来凝视他的特写照片。

sentences.en: It wasn't a very flattering photograph.
sentences.cn: 这张相片显得人不是十分漂亮。

sentences.en: Kate agreed to let me photograph her.
sentences.cn: 凯特同意让我为她拍照。

sentences.en: Leaphorn put the photograph on the desk.
sentences.cn: 利普霍恩把照片放在书桌上。

sentences.en: On the wall is a large framed photograph.
sentences.cn: 墙上挂着一张大幅的镶框照片。

sentences.en: Our photograph shows how the plants will turn out.
sentences.cn: 我们的照片展示了植物的生长状况。

sentences.en: She dug out a photograph from under a pile of papers.
sentences.cn: 她从一堆报纸下面抽出一张照片。

sentences.en: The enclosed photograph is unfortunately not good enough to reproduce.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，附寄的照片不够清晰，无法复制。

sentences.en: The girl squinted at the photograph.
sentences.cn: 女孩觑着眼看那张照片。

sentences.en: The girl squinted at the photograph. She seemed to be nearsighted.
sentences.cn: 女孩眯起眼睛看照片。她好像近视。

sentences.en: The Guardian's front page carries a photograph of the two foreign ministers.
sentences.cn: 《卫报》的头版刊登了两国外交部长的一张合影。

sentences.en: The photograph is captioned "People Power"
sentences.cn: 配图文字为“人民的力量”。

sentences.en: The photograph showed him wearing football togs.
sentences.cn: 照片上他穿着足球衣。

sentences.en: Tim was looking through an old photograph album (= book in which you put photographs ) .
sentences.cn: 蒂姆在翻看一本旧相册。

trans.tran_en: a picture obtained by using a camera and film that is sensitive to light
to take a photograph of someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 为…拍照，拍照，摄影，成为拍照对象，在照片上显得
